title: The Little red lighthouse
creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Story film for children. Uses the pictures and text of the book by Hildegarde Swift and Lyn Ward to tell about the little lighthouse whose existence is threatened by the building of the George Washington Bridge across the Hudson River.
description: Story film for children. Uses the pictures and text of the book by Hildegarde Swift and Lyn Ward to tell about the little lighthouse whose existence is threatened by the building of the George Washington Bridge across the Hudson River.
